description: This Python source file defines FastAPI API routes related to content management, including listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting content items. It uses dependency injection for the ContentService backed by MongoDB and provides API documentation details for each route.

methods.name: get_content_service
methods.description: Provides a ContentService instance with a MongoDB backend, configured as a dependency for route handlers.

methods.name: list_content
methods.description: Endpoint to list content items with pagination, returning a ContentListResponse.

methods.name: get_content
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve a specific content item by ID, returning a ContentRead object.

methods.name: create_content
methods.description: Endpoint to create new content, accepting a ContentCreate payload and returning a ContentRead object.

methods.name: update_content
methods.description: Endpoint to update existing content by ID with a ContentUpdate payload, returning the updated ContentRead.

methods.name: delete_content
methods.description: Endpoint to delete a content item by ID, returning a confirmation dictionary.
